recipesJson.name: Rin's Blueberry Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Blueberry Cheesecake icecream..... not much else to say. You can sub whichever ice cream you like. (TFA, LB, whatever)

reviews.text: This recipe is wonderful in its simplicity. It's definitely something you can vape for an extensive amount of time, and not grow tired of it. I tried it with the ice cream combination used in the recipe, and I recommend doing the same. The mild combination of cream and vanilla adds a perfectly pleasant and mellow background to the always delicious combination of bilberry and blueberry. The notes of graham cracker and cheesecake are quite subtle, and do not overpower the rest of the flavors at all.
I'll give you five stars cuz I agree with Alfred pudding and am not sure why he only gave you four seemed pretty positive to me
